metadata.title: CVE-2024-35788 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix bounds check for dcn35 DcfClocks [Why]NumFclkLevelsEnabled is used for DcfClocks bounds check instead ofdesignated NumDcfClkLevelsEnabled. That can cause array index out-of-boundsaccess. [How] Use designated variable for dcn35 DcfClocks bounds check.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
